title: An apostolicall injunction for unity and peace. Or, a sermon preached by George Downame Master of Arts of Christs Colledge in Cambridge, to the parishioners of Saint Stephens in Walbrooke, at his departure from them
author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
publisher: Printed by J. Okes dwelling in little S. Bartholomews,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
